mapper.select: SELECT ou.org_user_id, comp.comp_id, comp.comp_name, dept.dept_id, dept.dept_name, authority_code, authority_name FROM organization_user ou LEFT JOIN department dept ON ou.dept_id=dept.dept_id LEFT JOIN establishment est ON dept.est_id=est.est_id LEFT JOIN company comp ON comp.comp_id=est.comp_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT user_role.org_user_id, authority.authority_code, authority.authority_name FROM user_role INNER JOIN authority ON user_role.authority_code=authority.authority_code) AS role ON ou.org_user_id=role.org_user_id WHERE user_id=#{userId} order by authority_code asc, ou.org_user_id asc;
